ai.title: Meet Haman: Your AI Learning Agent
ai.description: Haman is more than just a chatbot; it's an intelligent agent trained to be your personal guide and tutor on your learning journey. Interact, ask questions, and explore concepts in a completely new way.

m1.message: Hello! I am Haman, your AI learning agent, trained and ready to explore new ideas with you. What are you curious about today?

m2.message: Can you explain the concept of photosynthesis in a simple way?

m3.message: Absolutely! Think of photosynthesis as how plants make their food using sunlight, water, and air. Ready to dive into the details, or would you prefer a quick overview first?
